description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Set up business objectives in accordance with assigned tasks.
              
              - Finding new construction projects
              
              - Working with contractors / consultants to find out information about projects
              
              - Transfer information about the project to the Sales Department
              
              - Product introduction
              
              - New product development
              
              - Working with suppliers, updating new products.
              
              - Coordinate and manage the Customer Care Team, Sales Team and Design Team
              

              ** Welfare:
              

              - 13th month bonus, bonus follow actual company achievement
              
              - In terms of annual salary increases based on job performance of individuals and the business performance of the company.
              
              - Allowance: telephone, funeral or marriage, birthday.
              
              - Annual vacation
              
              - Opportunities to participate in training and events internal or oversea about the company's products.
              
              - Lucky Money & Women's Day Party
              
              - Health insurance and social insurance regime, annual leave in accordance with the Labor Law.
              
              - Accident insurance 24/24 during the working time.
              
              - In addition to 12 days of holidays & Ceremony / Festival under the provisions of the State, all other staff are paid leaves 2 more days (including holidays Lunar 15/4 and 25/12 Noel ordinances flexible annual calendar).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Age: From 35 years old
              
              - Graduated from University of Economics, Tech, Engineering, Mechanical, Construction
              
              - At least 2-3 years experience in similar position.
              
              - Preferably candidates in the fire, engineering, mechanical engineering, construction is an advantage
              
              - Fluent in English (listening, speaking, reading and writing)
              
              - Proficient in office.
              
              - Good communication, negotiation and persuasion.
              
              - Sharp in operating and handling situations.
              
              - Skills in business planning, analysis and market development.
              
              - Awareness, able to present to the crowd
              
              - Accepting to work far away, work pressure
              
              - Dynamic, able to work independently, good thinking, ability to grasp good work
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
